entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail. Wind south 20 km/h. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h except southeast 40 gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
